title: Vectra Detection Insights
description: This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into Vectra detections and related activities, enabling analysis of threat severity and certainty, monitoring of triage and analyst workload, identification of high-risk detections, and detailed investigation to support effective threat response and prioritization.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into Vectra detections and related activities, enabling analysis of threat severity and certainty, monitoring of triage and analyst workload, identification of high-risk detections, and detailed investigation to support effective threat response and prioritization.

For more information, see the [Vectra Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vectra/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
This group provides a high-level view of detections, highlighting total detections, modification trends over time, top detections, and category distribution.

This group provides detailed insights into detections, including impacted entities, threat score metrics and trends, triage and assignment status, detection sources, sensor coverage, and complete detection records for investigation.

This group provides visibility into detection-related activities, showing activity volume and trends, status and category breakdowns, associated entities and MITRE techniques, and detailed activity records.

definition.title: Detection activities by category over time
